g3dsys.images

Class Figure

  • java.lang.Object
    • g3dsys.images.Figure
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Axes, Ball, Bond, Box, Ellipse, ImageShell, Line, Triangle

    public abstract class Figure
extends java.lang.Object
    Superclass for drawable shapes. The subclasses store all location information as molecule space coordinates (in Angstroms). These are converted to pixel coordinates based on current rotation, translation, zoom, and perspective settings by the CoordMapper whenever the Figures need to draw themselves. The drawing methods are intended to be called by FigureManager.
